price: (15) No! If he does not desist, We will surely drag him by the forelock[1952] –
arabic: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمۡ يَنتَهِ لَنَسۡفَعَۢا بِٱلنَّاصِيَةِ
footnotes: [1952]- It may also mean "slap him" or "blacken his face at the forelock."

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: kallā la-in lam yantahi lanasfaʿan bil-nāṣiyati
